abstract: Canadian Sen Don Meredith is expelled from Conservative caucus after reportedly having extramarital affair with teenage girl.
lead_paragraph: The governing Conservative Party removed Don Meredith from its caucus after a newspaper reported that he had had an extramarital affair with a teenage girl.

headline.main: Canadian Senator Expelled From Party’s Caucus Over Claims of Affair With Teenager
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Canada: Conservatives Expel a Senator

snippet: The governing Conservative Party removed Don Meredith from its caucus after a newspaper reported that he had had an extramarital affair with a teenage girl.
